title: Marci Shimoff-Happy for No Reason
description:
Marci Shimoff, #1 New York Times best-selling author has spent over 35 years studying happiness. Based on cutting-edge scientific research and interviews withover 100 genuinely happy people--and illustrated with inspiring stories--HAPPY FOR NO REASON lays out a powerful, holistic seven-step plan for increasing our level of happiness.

True happiness is a lasting, neuro-physiological state of peace and well-being. It&#039;s not based on what we have or do--or on any external reason or circumstance. Marci&#039;s research reveals that we all have a happiness set-point. No matter what happens--good or bad--we tend to return to our pre-set range of happiness. And, just like turning up a thermostat, we can actually reprogram our happiness setting to a higher level. This eye-opening guidebook offers a practical program that will forever change how we create happiness in our lives.
